00048 void EagleDbSqlValue_Delete(EagleDbSqlValue *value)
00049 {

00056 char* EagleDbSqlValue_toString(EagleDbSqlValue *value)
00057 {
00058     switch(value->type) {
00059         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeInteger:
00060         {
00061             char buf[32];
00062             sprintf(buf, "%d", value->value.intValue);
00063             return strdup(buf);
00064         }
00065

00067             return strdup("*");
00068             
00069         case EagleDbSqlValueTypeIdentifier:
00070             return strdup(value->value.identifier);
